'''Boared to Death''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to be defeated by a [[Forest Boar]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*This is easily achieved by letting a character fall to their death and then reviving them with low-HP food. This allows them to be more easily defeated by a boar.
*Being defeated by a [[Snowboar]] will not count towards this achievement.
* The Chinese name {{Lang|"Almost beat a boar at ten years old"|zh=十岁差点打倒野猪}} is a reference to an achievement of the game ''{{w|Mabinogi}}'', {{Lang|"Who Almost Slew a Bear at 10"|zh=十岁差点打倒熊}}.
